text: BING NEWS: Bergeron Scores 2 in 3rd Period as Bruins Beat Coyotes 5-3 Patrice Bergeron scored twice in the last 11 minutes to lift the Boston Bruins to a 5-3 victory over the Arizona Coyotes on Saturday night. Tyler Randell, Dave Krejci and Brad Marchand also scored to help the Bruins win their second straight.
